item.title: Historian James Millward does away with several myths about the Silk Road.
item.description:
Historian James Millward does away with several myths about the Silk Road.

Book: "The Silk Road: A Very Short Introduction" with GU's own James Millward April 15, 2013 James Millward's new book, The Silk Road: A Very Short Introduction (Oxford University Press, 2013) has been published. It is both an introduction to, and provocative argument about, the nature and significance of trans-Eurasian exchanges in world history.

item.title: The Ural region in the mind of writer Alexei Ivanov
item.description:
The Ural region in the mind of writer Alexei Ivanov

В ЭТОЙ СЕРИИ: ОПИСАНИЕ - Орёл-городок на Каме - Остров Чудского городка - Недра Кунгурской пещеры - Ермаково городище - Скалу Ермак речку А ТАК ЖЕ - как Ермак покорил сибирское ханство - Русь превратилась в Россию, а Урал стал ее серединой, хребтом - Истинное происхождение сюжета русской сказки о "Серебряное копытце" - О происхождении самовара

item.title: Book: The Silk Road: A Very Short Introduction with Georgetown's Professor James Millward
item.description:
Book: The Silk Road: A Very Short Introduction with Georgetown's Professor James Millward

Historian James Millward does away with several myths about the Silk Road.

item.title: The legendary Silk Road keeps on being a matter of fascination, as it enabled contact and exchange between people of so many different cultures.
item.description: The legendary Silk Road keeps on being a matter of fascination, as it enabled contact and exchange between people of so many different cultures.
